data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: Josie was a quiet girl who lived in a small village and had a hobby as a stamp collector. Her dad worked in the local post office so she had access to lots of stamps and loved seeing all the different types on the letters that came though the post office, although she would never use any of her stamp collection on normal letters herself, they were too special to her. When letters would be returned to the post office when a letter couldn't be posted, her father would send the old stamps her way.
data.summary: stamp collection from returned letters

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: Lucy threw the letter on the ground. She was not going to read another word of this rubbish. She stamped on the envelope and screwed her heel into the paper, ripping it. How satisfying, she thought, that'll teach him to send me such dross. She walked out of the room with her head held high, smiling at the feeling of release and closure.
data.summary: stamping on a letter and sending a message

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: yesterday i received a letter in the post . As i pulled it out of the letterbox I jumped back. A large spider had come in with it. In order to avoid it running up my leg I was hopping about and also trying not to stamp on it. In the end I opened the door and it moved to the step. I used the sweeping brush to help send it on its way.
data.summary: avoiding stamping on a spider and sending it away

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: It was 2040 and Marly was sat at the breakfast table with her robot. "Many years ago, we could only send a letter if we had a stamp. Nobody uses stamps any more."
data.summary: letters once required stamps to send

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: When I used to work at the old newspaper printing press factory, we used to have to manually insert the letter stamp tiles into the device to print the text onto the newspapers. This was a very time-consuming process, however once the job was completed, I felt a sense of pride that we managed to get the newspapers ready on time. Once they were bundled up, we would have to pack them onto shipping pallets ready to send to the stores to sell.
data.summary: stamping letters before sending them

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: I can't believe he just broke up with me, and even worse he broke up with me over text! My phone pinged and all I saw was the letter for his initials pop up on my text screen. Not even a curtsy call or anything, he simply wrote "This isn't working, it's over" and hit send. I shouldn't have expected anything more as he certainly doesn't get the stamp of approval from my parents.
data.summary: letter received via text without a stamp, sent abruptly

data.output: "Send for the detective" screamed the woman staring at the body on the ground. Detective Monroe soon arrived and could clearly see the body had been long dead, the letter of the infamous stamp killer, stamped onto the victims head with significant force was plain to see. data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: As he sent the email, the screen went blank and Jon knew something was wrong.  Since receiving that letter from an anonymous sender, things had gone from bad to worse. A self-confessed miser, Jon never affixed a stamp to any of his letters, instead making the recipient pay for the privilege of receiving his communications.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: Whilst marking my pupil's test scores, I use a different colour stamp based on their performance. If they have done well, the stamp is green. If they have done poorly, the stamp is red and I send the student to an after school revision class. To get permission for this, I must get a permission letter signed by their parents.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: As I was preparing to send my gifts out, I walked up to the door of the post office and noticed a letter lying on the ground. data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: Emma wanted to send a message to the public about climate change. She felt that people were not taking the subject seriously, and she wanted to do something about it, drawing as much attention as possible to the issue. Emma visited her local craft store, where she bought giant stamps for every letter of the alphabet, and colourful inks to suit. On her walk home, Emma stamped important and significant messages on the sides of buildings, in the middle of the streets, on public benches and bins, to spread the word about climate change.
data.summary: stamping letters to send a message
